description: Jonathann Daval initially reported his wife as missing, but later confessed to killing her.
title: France murder: Jonathann Daval jailed for 25 years for killing wife
title_page: France murder: Jonathann Daval jailed for 25 years for killing wife - BBC News
maintext: Earlier this week, when asked by the judge if he admitted to "being the only person implicated in the death" of his wife, he replied "yes".
